items.q: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
items.a: Yes, absolutely. There are no forced contracts. You can cancel from your dashboard with a single click and your access will remain until the end of the billing cycle.
Security is our priority. We use bank-grade encryption and comply with health data protection regulations. No one but you has access to the files.

items.q: What tools and tests are currently available?
items.a: Our library includes mental health tests (PHQ-9, BDI), development (M-CHAT), speech therapy, occupational therapy, and medical calculators. We add new tools monthly.

items.q: Do you offer plans for companies?
items.a: Yes, for clinics and hospitals contact us for a tailored plan.

items.q: Are my data and my patients' data private?
items.a: Absolutely. Your account is private and data is encrypted. We do not have access to your patients' clinical information.

items.q: Do you comply with data protection laws?
items.a: Yes, our infrastructure complies with GDPR and HIPAA, guaranteeing maximum confidentiality and ethical security.

items.q: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
items.a: Your data remains yours. You can export all your patients' and tests' information before closing your account.

items.q: Do you have support if something fails?
items.a: Yes, we have a specialized technical support team available 24/7 to resolve any inconvenience immediately.

About.title: Our Story
About.subtitle: Born from real necessity in daily clinical practice.
About.story_p1: It all started in my own practice. As a health professional, I was constantly frustrated by the immense amount of time I wasted manually scoring tests, adding up scores, and writing repetitive reports. Those were valuable hours I wasn't dedicating to my patients.
About.story_p2: I realized I wasn't alone; my colleagues shared the same administrative burnout. I understood that technology should be our ally, not a barrier. Thus Neurometrics was born: a platform designed by clinicians, for clinicians, with the mission to automate the tedious so we can refocus on the human aspect.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro_body: At Neurometrics, we take the privacy of your data and that of your patients very seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
Privacy.info_body: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email, professional information, and billing data. We also process patient data you enter into the platform, acting as data processors.
Privacy.usage_body: We use the information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
Privacy.security_body: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest.
Privacy.rights_body: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can exercise these rights by contacting us through our support.

Terms.acceptance_body: By accessing and using Neurometrics, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, do not use our services.
Terms.use_body: You agree to use the platform only for lawful and professional purposes. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

Terms.liability_body: Neurometrics provides the platform "as is". We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. We are not responsible for clinical decisions made based on our reports.
Terms.modifications_body: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes.
Terms.mor_body: Our order process is conducted by our online reseller Paddle.com. Paddle.com is the Merchant of Record for all our orders. Paddle provides all customer service inquiries and handles returns.

Refund.title: Refund Policy
Refund.trial_body: We offer a 7-day free trial period for all our new plans. During this time, you can cancel your subscription at any time at no cost.
Refund.cancellation_body: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. Cancellation will be effective at the end of the current billing cycle. You will have access to the service until the end of that cycle.

If you are not satisfied with the service within the first 14 days of your purchase, you may request a full refund by contacting our support team.

Refund.changes_body: If you switch from one plan to another, the price adjustment will be prorated automatically on your next invoice.

clinical-records.title: Digital Clinical Record
clinical-records.emotionalTitle: Remember why you chose this vocation?
clinical-records.emotionalDesc: It wasn't to fill out endless forms or struggle with paper records. You heal, listen, and transform lives. Neurometrics gives that sacred time back to you.
clinical-records.problem: Bureaucracy consumes 40% of the time of a private session, wearing down the professional and distancing them from what really matters: the patient.
clinical-records.solution: Our Intelligent Clinical Record flows with you. Record progress in seconds, access history with one click, and let technology handle administrative details while you care for mental health.
benefits: Goodbye to clutter: Everything centralized in one secure place.
Attention recovery: Less screen, more eye contact.
Ethical Security: Medical-grade encryption for your peace of mind.

test-automation.title: Test Automation
test-automation.emotionalTitle: Precision that grants peace of mind
test-automation.emotionalDesc: Doubt is the heaviest weight in a diagnosis. When a person's well-being depends on a score, there is no room for human error.
test-automation.problem: Correcting tests manually is tedious and prone to errors that can alter a vital clinical diagnosis.
test-automation.solution: Total automation. From PHQ-9 to complex cognitive scales. Get instant results with guaranteed scientific validity, allowing you to deliver impeccable reports in record time.
benefits: Zero errors: Validated algorithms ensuring total accuracy.
Instant reports: From response to report in one second.
Clinical Confidence: The technical backing your professionalism deserves.

medical-calculators.title: Medical Calculators
medical-calculators.emotionalDesc: In medicine, details are not small; they are fundamental. Every dose, every risk, and every index is a key piece in the healthcare puzzle.
medical-calculators.problem: Closing the gap between observation and mathematical precision can be stressful under clinical pressure.
medical-calculators.solution: A suite of high-precision calculation tools integrated into your workflow. BMI, pediatric dosing, surgical risks and more, always at your disposal to eliminate any uncertainty.
benefits: Safety in decision making: Precise data, safe decisions.
Professional Agility: Get critical results without leaving the consultation.
Scientific Rigor: Tools based on universal clinical formulas.

ai-copilot.title: AI Clinical Copilot
ai-copilot.emotionalDesc: The loneliness of the office can be overwhelming. There are cases that challenge our experience and force us to seek a second opinion.
ai-copilot.problem: Professional isolation and the cognitive load of analyzing thousands of clinical variables simultaneously.
ai-copilot.solution: A clinical decision assistant that never rests. Our AI analyzes patterns, suggests evidence-based protocols, and helps you structure your reasoning, empowering your skills, not replacing them.
benefits: Strategic Ally: A second pair of expert eyes analyzing every case.
Instant Evidence: Suggestions based on thousands of clinical protocols.
Mental Clarity: Reduce information fatigue with intelligent summaries.

mobile-access.title: Neurometrics Mobile
mobile-access.emotionalDesc: Mental health happens everywhere, not just behind a desk. Real professional freedom is being able to care without being tied to an office.
mobile-access.problem: The rigidity of traditional systems that only work on a desktop computer.
mobile-access.solution: All the power of Neurometrics in your pocket. Apply tests during home visits, review records on the go, and maintain total control of your practice with an interface designed to be fluid, mobile, and secure.
benefits: Freedom of Movement: Your clinic travels with you, always.
Immediate Response: Evaluate and decide at the key moment, wherever you are.
Total Flexibility: Optimize your time between appointments intelligently.
